Class SceneManager

java.lang.Object
fr.polytech.picknpic.ui.SceneManager
public class SceneManager extends Object
Manages scenes and user interactions within the application. Handles navigation between different views and maintains the current user state.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Constructs a new SceneManager instance.
